attributes.action: Acutally do the things these petitions ask of him
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This site has the potential to make a really positive impact on the politics of this country. To help us realise this goal we call upon the prime minister to actually commit to a Public Inquiry as a result of these petitions. Simple but binding requirements based on receiving more than 600,000 responses (1% of uk population) and no sizable counter petition existing should be enacted. We are not putting our time in to this so we can receive non-committal responses when the petitions close.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
